valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 15 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 16 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low 50 miles west of Bailey 971, moving steadily northeast, losing its identity by midday tomorrow

Wind
In northwest, southwesterly 4 to 6. In southeast, westerly or southwesterly 2 to 4.
Sea state
Moderate or rough.
Weather
In northwest, showers. In southeast, occasional rain.
Visibility
In northwest, good. In southeast, good, occasionally poor.
